title: Drawing, "Design for carriage understructure", 1780
medium: Pen and black ink, traces of graphite, brush and wash on white laid paper
markings: Stamp: Cooper Union Museum, New York
inscribed: Inscribed in ink, upper center: Lisoire, avecque Les deux moutons/ vue de face; right, vertically: Mouton de profils; left, vertically: Mouton; verso, in graphite, larrosserie/ ... de la Londe/ Cahier G No. 4 -
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Profile of the beam is shown beside the elevation of the understructure which is decorated with a beaded oval at center within a shield, garlands at top and bottom, volutes at either side. At top, scale: 2 pied. Framing lines.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for carriage understructure", 1780.
1780. Pen and black ink, traces of graphite, brush and wash on white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-190.
